message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the enthusiasm! I'm really interested, but $14,000 is a bit high for my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,500. What do you think?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $13,500. What do you think?
